translation.en: Good morning, Lusaka!
translation.ja: おはよう ルサカ！

translation.en: This is Reporter Geoffrey bringing you the Lusaka News!
translation.ja: ジェフリーが ニュースをお伝えします

translation.en: While the sun may be shining brightly, last night
translation.ja: 天気はよさそうですが 昨夜 なぞの竜巻(たつまき)が発生

translation.en: another mysterious tornado struck.
translation.ja: 昨夜 なぞの竜巻(たつまき)が発生

translation.en: Its powerful winds knocked out power for hours.
translation.ja: 数時間 停電しました

translation.en: - Iye, Geoffrey, I know. - Hey, iwe!
translation.ja: そうよね ジェフリー

translation.en: Elo, I was busy finishing my project for the Science fair ka.
translation.ja: 科学展の作品を作ってた

translation.en: Geoffrey, do you realize Mr. Magedzee - is going to be there? -
translation.ja: マゲッジーさんも来るのよ

translation.en: These tricky twisters were previously unheard of in Zambia, and indeed, Africa.
translation.ja: 竜巻(たつまき)はザンビアでは 前例がありません

translation.en: So why are they happening, Geoffrey?
translation.ja: なぜ発生してるの？

translation.en: Blackouts from load shedding were bad enough. Now tornados?
translation.ja: 停電もひどかった 今度は 竜巻(たつまき)？

translation.en: Likando, why did I join the majorettes?
translation.ja: なぜバトン部に入ったのかな

translation.en: It's bad enough being the new kid at school.
translation.ja: 転校生は大変なのに

translation.en: Ah- ah, Monde.
translation.ja: モンデ

translation.en: Did you forget you were captain of your old majorette team?
translation.ja: 前のチームで キャプテンだった

translation.en: You've got this, little sis.
translation.ja: あなたならできる

translation.en: These tornados are just another disaster battering Lusaka. With an increase in crime and daily blackouts,
translation.ja: 竜巻(たつまき)は犯罪と停電に なやむルサカに大打撃(だいだげき)です

translation.en: the people are calling for Mayor Sikazwe's resignation.
translation.ja: 人々は市長の辞任を 求めています

translation.en: - No more blackouts! - Please! No more load shedding!
translation.ja: 停電も節電もウンザリ

translation.en: Sisi, if Mayor Sikazwe gets fired, you could lose your job.
translation.ja: 市長がクビになったら 姉さんも失業する

translation.en: Don't worry about me.
translation.ja: 心配いらない

translation.en: I don't plan on being the mayor's assistant for long.
translation.ja: 市長の助手は長くやらない

translation.en: I see much bigger and better things for us soon.
translation.ja: もっと大きな夢をかなえるわ

translation.en: Iwe Monde! Get over here now!
translation.ja: モンデ 早くこっちに来て

translation.en: Coming, Marjory.
translation.ja: はい マージョリー

translation.en: This is Chipo
translation.ja: こちらチポ

translation.en: with Kamiji Secondary's very own star player of the fútbol team,
translation.ja: 我らがカミジ中学校の サッカースター

translation.en: Zikomo Phiri!
translation.ja: ジコモ･フィリです

translation.en: This is Zee with Kamiji Secondary School's very own Chipo Hamoonga,
translation.ja: こちらジー 我らがカミジ中学校の チポ･ハムンガです

translation.en: who is crushing on Komana Mwiinga.
translation.ja: コマナに片思い中

translation.en: Stop, ekse! -
translation.ja: やめろよ

translation.en: One vitumbuwa. Two vitumbuwa.
translation.ja: ヴィトゥンブワ １つ ２つ

translation.en: Who am I kidding?
translation.ja: 足りないわ

translation.en: Thank you, Ba Saasa!
translation.ja: ありがとう バサーサ

translation.en: - Hey! - Huh? Temwe Chiti! Are you stealing food?
translation.ja: テムウェ･チティ ぬすんだ？

translation.en: Principal Nkwashi, what do you take me for? - A delinquent? - Hm.
translation.ja: ンクワシ校長 私が不良だと思ってます？

translation.en: I've got my eye on you, Chiti.
translation.ja: この目で見てるぞ

translation.en: What's the other eye doing?
translation.ja: 反対の目は？

translation.en: Lusaka hasn't endured this kind of turmoil in 20 years. Who can keep our city safe?
translation.ja: ルサカでこんな混乱は初めて だれが街の安全を守る？

translation.en: Mama K's Juice Ya Cheapa!
translation.ja: ママＫのジュースはいかが

translation.en: - T.O.M.I., come online please. - T.O.M.I. here, Mama K.
translation.ja: トミー 応答せよ はい

translation.en: The threat is growing, T.O.M.I. We need our new team today to keep our people safe!
translation.ja: もう待てない 今日 新しいチームが必要

translation.en: Commencing final footage collection to confirm our candidates.
translation.ja: 候補者の画像を収集します

translation.en: - Mama K! - Oh!
translation.ja: ママＫ 準備はできました？

translation.en: - Are you all set up? - Oh, yes, Mr. Nkwashi, thank you.
translation.ja: ママＫ 準備はできました？ はい ンクワシ校長

translation.en: Um, if you don't mind, I may need to speak to you later about volunteers for my fruit and vegetable stand.
translation.ja: 後で私の店の ボランティアについて相談が

translation.en: Volunteers? Anything to help a member of our little community.
translation.ja: ボランティア？　喜んで

translation.en: - - Hello, everybody! Hello, bantu banga.
translation.ja: こんにちは みなさん

translation.en: I am Lee Magedzee, owner of Magedzee Power Corporation.
translation.ja: 私はリー マゲッジー電力会社(ＭＰＣ)の社長

translation.en: Thank you for inviting me to Kamiji Secondary School's Science Fair.
translation.ja: カミジ中学校 科学展への お招きに感謝します

translation.en: At MPC, we are committed to bringing power to the people!
translation.ja: ＭＰＣは全力でみなさんへ 電力をお届けしてます

translation.en: I am beyond excited to see your inventions
translation.ja: みなさんの発明を 見るのが楽しみ

translation.en: and discover if one of you will be the next recipient of our MPC scholarship!
translation.ja: 次のＭＰＣ奨学金(しょうがくきん)の受賞者を 見つけたい

translation.en: The power to save our world starts with you students.
translation.ja: 世界を救うのは 学生の君たちだ

translation.en: Yes!
translation.ja: そうよ

translation.en: Mr. Magedzee!
translation.ja: マゲッジーさん

translation.en: I am Komana Mwiinga. I would like to apply for the MPC Scholarship.
translation.ja: 私はコマナ･ムウィンガ 奨学金(しょうがくきん)に申しこみたい

translation.en: So nice to meet you.
translation.ja: うれしいな

translation.en: May I present to you my Carbon Capture machine.
translation.ja: 炭素キャッチマシンです

translation.en: Very intriguing. I'm all ears.
translation.ja: 面白そうだ　説明して

translation.en: Well, the concept is based on--
translation.ja: このマシンは…

translation.en: Another power station attack. And the tornado is headed here.
translation.ja: また発電所がねらわれた 竜巻(たつまき)はここに来る

translation.en: T.O.M.I., focus on the tornado.
translation.ja: トミー 竜巻(たつまき)の正体を探って

translation.en: - We need to know what is really going on. - Yes, Mama K.
translation.ja: トミー 竜巻(たつまき)の正体を探って 了解(りょうかい)

translation.en: Attention! Take shelter under the stands! Follow me!
translation.ja: みんな にげるんだ こっちへ

translation.en: Help! Somebody! I'm trapped.
translation.ja: 助けてくれ　動けない

translation.en: - - Help!
translation.ja: 助けて

translation.en: Hey! - Help Mr. Nkwashi. - Huh?
translation.ja: ンクワシ校長をお願い

translation.en: Help me, please!
translation.ja: 助けてくれ

translation.en: But Ba Saasa! And the vitumbuwa!
translation.ja: バサーサと ヴィトゥンブワは？

translation.en: Help!
translation.ja: 助けて！

translation.en: - Help! - I've got them!
translation.ja: 助けて！ 私に任せて

translation.en: May I use this, Gogo?
translation.ja: 借りていい？

translation.en: Ba Saasa, use this!
translation.ja: バサーサ 使って

translation.en: Help!
translation.ja: 助けて！

translation.en: - Mr. Nkwashi, pull yourself to safety. - Don't tell me what to do, Chiti!
translation.ja: これにつかまって出てきて 指図するな

translation.en: But I'm trying to help you!
translation.ja: あなたを助けたい

translation.en: Hm. I should have saved the vitumbuwa.
translation.ja: 助けて損したわ

translation.en: Help! Help!
translation.ja: 助けて！　助けてくれ！

translation.en: Help!
translation.ja: 助けて！

translation.en: - Let's go, Marjory. - Eh! Let's go who?
translation.ja: マージョリー 何て？

translation.en: Let's go, Captain.
translation.ja: 行こう キャプテン

translation.en: - - I've got you, Chipo!
translation.ja: 私に任せて

translation.en: - Run! -
translation.ja: 走って！

translation.en: Gogo, run!
translation.ja: おばあさん 早く

translation.en: A freak tornado ran through the city, striking another power station
translation.ja: 竜巻(たつまき)の発生で 発電所が破壊(はかい)され

translation.en: and wreaking havoc on Kamiji Secondary School.
translation.ja: カミジ中学校は大混乱

translation.en: - Tensions in Lusaka are rising… - …with endemic blackouts bringing life to a standstill, and repeated…
translation.ja: 度重なる停電の影響で ルサカの市民の生活は…

translation.en: Komana.
translation.ja: コマナ

translation.en: Here you go, Ta. Use this.
translation.ja: パパ これを使って

translation.en: - Catch your breath. -
translation.ja: 落ち着いて

translation.en: - Are you okay now? - Yes. Thank you.
translation.ja: 大じょうぶ？ ああ　ありがとう

translation.en: Mr. Nkwashi just called. You are required to attend a meeting.
translation.ja: 校長から電話があった 会合に出席してと

translation.en: Are you in trouble?
translation.ja: 何か問題？

translation.en: Huh? What? No. Wait. When is this meeting?
translation.ja: まさか　会合っていつ？

translation.en: Mr. Magedzee is giving me another chance to present my Carbon Capture machine. At his office in just a few hours!
translation.ja: もうすぐマゲッジーさんに 私の発明を見せる約束なのよ

translation.en: - Mr. Nkwashi said, Right now. - And gave me an address.
translation.ja: ンクワシ校長は今すぐと 住所だ

translation.en: It's not at school. Where is this?
translation.ja: 学校ではない　どこ？

translation.en: So I guess I'm not the only one with detention.
translation.ja: 呼び出しは 私だけではないのね

translation.en: Yeah, you have the wrong girl. Me? Detention? Aweh. We don't mix.
translation.ja: 私が呼び出されるはずがない あなたとちがう

translation.en: Me neither. I just moved here.
translation.ja: 私もちがう　転校生よ

translation.en: Oh. Hi. I'm Monde.
translation.ja: 私はモンデよ

translation.en: Hey. Zee.
translation.ja: どうも ジーよ

translation.en: If we're not serving detention, why did Mr. Nkwashi send us here?
translation.ja: なぜ校長は ここに呼んだの？

translation.en: Because I asked him to.
translation.ja: 私がたのんだから

translation.en: Oh! The Juice Ya Cheapa lady.
translation.ja: ジュース屋さんね

translation.en: Muli bwanji, girls.
translation.ja: 元気かしら？

translation.en: Bwino bwanji, Gogo.
translation.ja: はい 元気です

translation.en: I am Mama K. This is Chomps.
translation.ja: 私はママＫ こちらはチョンプス

translation.en: - - And you have arrived at my fruit and vegetable stand.
translation.ja: 私のジュース屋へようこそ

translation.en: You four have been offered this great opportunity to give back to your community.
translation.ja: あなたたちに地域のために 働く機会をあげる

translation.en: - Opportunity for free labor, ka. -
translation.ja: タダ働きの機会？

translation.en: You will save the world working here.
translation.ja: ここから世界を救う

translation.en: Eh? Here?
translation.ja: ここ？

translation.en: Mm, Gogo. I have an important appointment this afternoon.
translation.ja: 私は大事な約束がある

translation.en: From what time to what time are we saving the world?
translation.ja: いつ世界を救うの？

translation.en: Right now. But not right here.
translation.ja: 今すぐ　でも ここではない

translation.en: Come with me.
translation.ja: 来て

translation.en: What's that story with the old lady luring kids with sweets?
translation.ja: おばあさんは おかしで子供を誘拐(ゆうかい)する気？

translation.en: She's like a little old gogo, ha. Totally harmless.
translation.ja: ただのおばあさんよ 無害だわ

translation.en: - Little old gogo? - Hmm. That's how people disappear.
translation.ja: ただのおばあさん？ 一番あやしい

translation.en: Follow me, please.
translation.ja: ついてきて

translation.en: Mama weh.
translation.ja: まったく

translation.en: We are going to disappear.
translation.ja: 私たち 消えるかも

translation.en: As you know, girls, mysterious tornados have been causing destruction across Lusaka.
translation.ja: 知ってのとおり なぞの竜巻(たつまき)が発生してる

translation.en: But there is more to it than meets the eye.
translation.ja: この話には裏がある

translation.en: Abeg. You're one of those conspiracy theorists with an underground bunker.
translation.ja: ヤダ おばあさんは 地下室の陰謀(いんぼう)論者？

translation.en: This is where you are going to save the world.
translation.ja: ここで世界を救うのよ

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: え？

translation.en: - Are you serious? - Ati, what?
translation.ja: 本気なの？ すごいわ！

translation.en: So cool.
translation.ja: かっこいい

translation.en: - What? -
translation.ja: これは何？

translation.en: Wait, does Mr. Nkwashi know about this?
translation.ja: ンクワシ校長は知ってるの？

translation.en: No. He just thinks you're volunteering at the stand above.
translation.ja: 上の店のボランティアだと 思ってる

translation.en: This is my little secret.
translation.ja: これは私の秘密よ

translation.en: What is this place?
translation.ja: ここは何？

translation.en: Many years ago,
translation.ja: ずっと昔

translation.en: I was part of a secret government agency, working in these very headquarters, fighting evil forces in our city.
translation.ja: この政府の秘密組織の本部で 私は悪者と戦ってた

translation.en: Sha! This gogo is lekker.
translation.ja: すごい おばあさんなのね

translation.en: Eh, eh, eh. Did you just say evil forces? Evil how?
translation.ja: 悪者って言った？　どんな？

translation.en: As I was saying,
translation.ja: さっきも言ったけど 様子が変なの

translation.en: things are not what they seem. T.O.M.I., pull up drone footage from yesterday.
translation.ja: さっきも言ったけど 様子が変なの トミー 昨日の映像を

translation.en: Artificial intelligence.
translation.ja: 人工知能だわ

translation.en: Artificial boyfriend.
translation.ja: 人工の恋人よ

translation.en: Ah. Technological Operations Management Interface. T.O.M.I.
translation.ja: 技術　(Ｔ)操作　(Ｏ)管理(Ｍ) インターフェース　(Ｉ)トミー(ＴＯＭＩ)よ

translation.en: T.O.M.I., zoom in, please.
translation.ja: トミー 拡大して

translation.en: Zooming in.
translation.ja: 了解(りょうかい)

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Is that a guy caught in the tornado?
translation.ja: 男の人が竜巻(たつまき)に 巻きこまれてる？

translation.en: He's not caught in it.  - Basa, he's controlling it.
translation.ja: ちがう あの男が竜巻(たつまき)を操ってる

translation.en: Yes! The tornados are not a freak act of Mother Nature.
translation.ja: 自然現象の竜巻(たつまき)ではない

translation.en: They are an act of a supervillain.
translation.ja: ヴィランのしわざよ

translation.en: Supervillain?
translation.ja: ヴィラン？

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait! How? Why?
translation.ja: 待って　どうやって？ なぜ？

translation.en: I'm not sure yet. We need to find out and put a stop to him.
translation.ja: 私たちが かれを止めないと

translation.en: We? Did you just say we? She just said we.
translation.ja: 私たち？ “私たち”って言った？

translation.en: Mm. That's what she said. We.
translation.ja: “私たち”と言った

translation.en: I have been observing you keenly for weeks.
translation.ja: あなたたちを数週間 観察した

translation.en: Observing us? You mean like, stalking?
translation.ja: 観察ってストーキング？

translation.en: It's called gathering intelligence.
translation.ja: 情報収集と呼ぶのよ

translation.en: And based on what I've gathered, it is clear that you are the elite super squad I need to help save Lusaka.
translation.ja: ルサカを救うためには あなたたちが必要なの

translation.en: You mean, superheroes!
translation.ja: スーパーヒーローってこと？

translation.en: Uh, yeah. Okay. Superheroes.
translation.ja: そうよ　スーパーヒーロー

translation.en: And based on my astute observations, I have built super suits distinctive to each of you.
translation.ja: 私の完ペキな観察に基づいて 特製スーツを作った

translation.en: This is so…
translation.ja: すごいわ

translation.en: They've been designed to boost each of your natural abilities.
translation.ja: それぞれの能力が 強化されるデザインよ

translation.en: They'll keep you safe and protect your identity.
translation.ja: 安全と身元を守ってくれる

translation.en: All this talk about a suit. So what's with the watch?
translation.ja: スーツはともかく この時計は？

translation.en: Can I get a whoa?
translation.ja: “ワオ”はないの？

translation.en: Whoa.
translation.ja: ワオ！

translation.en: Oh! Sorry, Chomps!
translation.ja: ごめん！

translation.en: Oh, it happens.
translation.ja: 大じょうぶよ

translation.en: Now, girls, it is extremely important that you keep your secret identities secret.
translation.ja: あなたたちの正体は だれにも明かさないで

translation.en: No one can know.
translation.ja: 絶対に秘密

translation.en: - Not your sister. -  Not your father.
translation.ja: お姉さんにもお父さんにも

translation.en: Not your bestie friend. Not your vitumbuwa vendor.
translation.ja: 親友にも ヴィトゥンブワの店主にも

translation.en: You know about Ba Saasa?
translation.ja: バサーサのこと？

translation.en: It is for their protection as much as yours.
translation.ja: みんなの安全を守るため

translation.en: Yeah. Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: It has been 20 years since Lusaka needed a team of heroes.
translation.ja: ルサカがヒーローを 必要とするのは20年ぶり

translation.en: If we want our people to survive, they need a team they can depend on.
translation.ja: 人々を守るには たよれるチームが必要

translation.en: But why us, Mama K?
translation.ja: なぜ私たちなの？

translation.en: It's not every day a 60- year- old lady
translation.ja: ４人の若い女性が 危険に立ち向かう姿が

translation.en: sees four young women running into danger, shwi!
translation.ja: ４人の若い女性が 危険に立ち向かう姿が 60歳の老女の目に留まった

translation.en: Without thinking of themselves.
translation.ja: 60歳の老女の目に留まった

translation.en: But being a hero takes more than super strength suits and high- tech gear.
translation.ja: ヒーローにはスーツや 道具の他に個性が必要

translation.en: It takes character. Together,
translation.ja: ヒーローにはスーツや 道具の他に個性が必要 それでチームに必要な 資質がそろう

translation.en: you possess the innate qualities this team requires.
translation.ja: それでチームに必要な 資質がそろう

translation.en: Komana, K- Bongo, the lover of knowledge.
translation.ja: コマナ “Ｋボンゴ” 知識を愛する者

translation.en: Zee, Za- Mpezi, fast like lightning.
translation.ja: ジー “ザンペジ” 稲妻(いなずま)のように速い

translation.en: Monde, M- Kozo, the bringer of peace.
translation.ja: モンデ “Ｍコーゾー” 平和をもたらす

translation.en: And Temwe, T- Mlilo, full of fire.
translation.ja: テムウェ “Ｔミリロ” 炎(ほのお)そのもの

translation.en: Aww! I wanted to be T- Licious.
translation.ja: “Ｔおいしい”がよかった

translation.en: But T- Mlilo is awesome. Fiyah!
translation.ja: Ｔミリロも最高　炎(ほのお)ね！

translation.en: The mind, body, soul, and heart of our team.
translation.ja: チームとしての心構えと 体 魂　(たましい)心

translation.en: Together, you are my Team 4.
translation.ja: 全てそろえば 私のチームフォーよ

translation.en: - Okay! - So, is Team 4 ready to save Lusaka?
translation.ja: チームフォー ルサカを救える？

translation.en: - Ya, ya, ya! - Yes, Mama K.
translation.ja: ええ はい

translation.en: - Yes. Mm. - Yeah!
translation.ja: うん ええ

translation.en: T- Mlilo in the byu byu!
translation.ja: Ｔミリロはノリノリ

translation.en: Eh, byu byu? As in, building?
translation.ja: “ノリノリ”って？

translation.en: Eya boom! You got it, Mama K.
translation.ja: そうよ ママＫ

translation.en: Za- Mpezi in the byu byu.
translation.ja: ザンペジもノリノリ！

translation.en: Me too! M- Kozo in the byu byu!
translation.ja: 私も　Ｍコーゾーも ノリノリ！

translation.en: My appointment! I'm going to be late.
translation.ja: 約束の時間におくれる

translation.en: K- Bongo, wait!
translation.ja: 待って

translation.en: - Are you in… - The byu byu?
translation.ja: 入る？ ノリノリ？

translation.en: - No. - What?
translation.ja: いいえ え！

translation.en: I need to get that scholarship from Mr. Magedzee.
translation.ja: 私には奨学金(しょうがくきん)が必要なの

translation.en: Mama K, I'm sorry.
translation.ja: ママＫ ごめんなさい

translation.en: Wait, ba jobee,
translation.ja: 待ってよ 秀才

translation.en: you are leaving all these nice, nice things for the ka scholarship?
translation.ja: 奨学金(しょうがくきん)のために これをあきらめる？

translation.en: My entire future depends on it.
translation.ja: 私の将来がかかってる

translation.en: And my dad.
translation.ja: パパも

translation.en: He's sick.
translation.ja: 病気なの

translation.en: This is not how I'm going to save the world.
translation.ja: 私は世界を救えない

translation.en: I can't… I can't do it all.
translation.ja: 私にはできない

translation.en: - But-- - Ah, ah. Let her go.
translation.ja: でも… いいのよ

translation.en: The water may be boiling on the stove, but no one can force you to pour in the mealie meal.
translation.ja: 準備が整っていても 強制はできない

translation.en: You have to be hungry.
translation.ja: 自分が望まないと

translation.en: So, T- Mlilo's Team 3! - - How does everyone feel about that?
translation.ja: Ｔミリロのチームスリーね どう思う？

translation.en: Ah! What is happening, T.O.M.I.?
translation.ja: 何なの？

translation.en: - Oh ,no! - Girls, it's Go Go time!
translation.ja: 大変！ みんな 出動よ！

translation.en: Thank you for letting me present my project to you.
translation.ja: お時間を ありがとうございます

translation.en: Of course, Komana.
translation.ja: いいんだ コマナ

translation.en: We can't let a tornado get in the way of science, can we?
translation.ja: 竜巻(たつまき)に科学のジャマは させない

translation.en: No, sir.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: This is my solar- powered Carbon Capture machine.
translation.ja: これは炭素キャッチマシン

translation.en: My machine doesn't just capture carbon.
translation.ja: 炭素を取りこむだけではない

translation.en: It uses electricity generated from solar panels
translation.ja: 太陽パネルで作られた 電気を使って

translation.en: to split CO2 into energized carbon monoxide and oxygen.
translation.ja: 二酸化炭素を一酸化炭素と 酸素に分解する

translation.en: Once carbon monoxide is released, it's combined with hydrogen
translation.ja: 一酸化炭素は水素と合体して

translation.en: to produce safe, synthetic carbon- based fuels.
translation.ja: 安全な人工燃料が作られる

translation.en: Uh- huh. So we can purify dangerous CO2 from the atmosphere while producing clean fuel and oxygen at the other end.
translation.ja: 有害な二酸化炭素を利用して 燃料と酸素が作れるのか

translation.en: It's brilliant. How did you choose solar as your power source?
translation.ja: すばらしい なぜ太陽光を？

translation.en: Well, I looked into a number of energy resources. Geothermal, wind,
translation.ja: 地熱エネルギーや 風力発電も検討した

translation.en: even an extremely rare mineral called Zambianite.
translation.ja: ザンビアナイトという 希少鉱物も

translation.en: Ah, yes, I've heard of that mineral.
translation.ja: 聞いたことがある

translation.en: But ultimately, in Lusaka, the sun was the most reliable.
translation.ja: でもルサカでは太陽光が 最も安定してる

translation.en: Very true. And why a portable version of the Carbon Capture machine?
translation.ja: 確かに なぜ持ち運べるタイプに？

translation.en: My dad developed breathing problems from the pollution,
translation.ja: 父は大気汚染(おせん)で 呼吸器の病気に

translation.en: and other people might be suffering the same way.
translation.ja: 他にも困ってる人がいるはず

translation.en: That's what I love! Technology made to benefit the lives of others.
translation.ja: そこがすばらしい 人のためになる技術

translation.en: Astounding, Komana! I am impressed!
translation.ja: 感動したよ コマナ

translation.en: While we have a few candidates left to interview, I can tell you that you are in the top running.
translation.ja: 他にも候補者がいるが 君が最有力候補だ

translation.en: - - We'll have the final results soon.
translation.ja: 他にも候補者がいるが 君が最有力候補だ 最終結果は じきに伝える

translation.en: Dad!
translation.ja: パパ

translation.en: Um, Mr. Magedzee, I have to go. Thank you, sir.
translation.ja: もう行かないと　ありがとう

translation.en: Thank you for… coming, Komana.
translation.ja: 来てくれて… ありがとう

translation.en: Ta? Ninzi?
translation.ja: パパ 大変だわ

translation.en: - Komana. - Ta? Are you okay?
translation.ja: コマナ パパ 平気？　私はここよ

translation.en: I'm here, I'm here.
translation.ja: パパ 平気？　私はここよ

translation.en: Help! Help!
translation.ja: 助けて！　助けて！

translation.en: - Did you hear that? - Look, over there!
translation.ja: 聞こえた？ あそこよ

translation.en: Imwe, tiyeni!
translation.ja: 行こう

translation.en: - - Komana!
translation.ja: コマナ

translation.en: I need help!
translation.ja: 助けて

translation.en: Whati?
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: Huh. Well. That's new.
translation.ja: 私もびっくりよ

translation.en: Ta!
translation.ja: パパ

translation.en: Komana… You know these girls?
translation.ja: コマナ 知り合いか？

translation.en: Get him in the van. I'll take him to hospital.
translation.ja: 車に乗せて　病院に運ぶ

translation.en: Komana. Thank you, daughter.
translation.ja: コマナ ありがとう

translation.en: - Ta. -
translation.ja: パパ

translation.en: - You saved my dad's life. - Don't worry, Komana.
translation.ja: パパを救ってくれた お父さんは大じょうぶよ

translation.en: He's going to be fine.
translation.ja: お父さんは大じょうぶよ

translation.en: Mama K, I can save the world in different ways. I see that now.
translation.ja: ママＫ　私にも 世界を救える方法があるかも

translation.en: - Is it too late to… -
translation.ja: もうおそいかしら

translation.en: Suit up!
translation.ja: スーツを

translation.en: Bantu banga, we need to get to whoever is inside controlling this!
translation.ja: 中で操ってる人を つき止めよう

translation.en: T- Mlilo! Let's use your ribbon, like you did with Mr. Nkwashi.
translation.ja: Ｔミリロのリボンを使おう

translation.en: Great idea.
translation.ja: いい考えね

translation.en: Are you hurt?
translation.ja: 痛い？

translation.en: Just my pride. And my butt.
translation.ja: 私のプライドと おしりが

translation.en: We got him!
translation.ja: つかまえた！

translation.en: What do we do?
translation.ja: どうする？

translation.en: What is that?
translation.ja: それは？

translation.en: It's a brazier!
translation.ja: これは炎(ほのお)よ

translation.en: Look at you, K- Bongo!
translation.ja: すごい Ｋボンゴ

translation.en: Breaking up that tornado's cold air with a firebomb.
translation.ja: 竜巻(たつまき)の冷たい空気を 炎(ほのお)でこわした

translation.en: Genius, ekse. Genius.
translation.ja: あなたって天才よ

translation.en: All this trouble has been caused by some old man.
translation.ja: 老人のしわざだったのね

translation.en: Old?! Old?! I am Storm Drain.
translation.ja: 老人だと？ 私はストーム･ドレイン

translation.en: Creator of chaos!
translation.ja: 混乱の創造者

translation.en: - King of climate! -
translation.ja: 気候の王様だ

translation.en: I will not be defeated!
translation.ja: 私は絶対に負けない

translation.en: Looks like you just were, Grandpa.
translation.ja: 負けたわね おじいちゃん

translation.en: I can't believe we pulled that off.
translation.ja: 大成功だったわね

translation.en: Job well done! Congratulations, Team 4!
translation.ja: よくやったわ チームフォー

translation.en: The public was pleasantly surprised when a group of heroes calling themselves Team 4
translation.ja: チームフォーと 名乗るヒーローが現れ

translation.en: finally put an end to the natural disaster that was not so natural after all.
translation.ja: 自然災害が解決 自然災害ではなかったですが

translation.en: So, who are these heroes, and where do they come from?
translation.ja: このヒーローは何者？ どこから来た？

translation.en: Perhaps our pleas for help have finally been answered.
translation.ja: 助けを求める願いが 届いたのかも

translation.en: Be careful, Lusaka.
translation.ja: 気をつけろ ルサカ

translation.en: Those pleas will soon be drowned out by my power.
translation.ja: そんな願いは 私がズタズタにしてやる
